file_insights.primary_purpose: Interactive guided tour using React Joyride

patterns_discovered: custom styling using design system HSL variables
component with optional auto-start and callback props
tour step management using custom hook
error handling for missing tour target elements
gotchas_discovered: Delayed tour start with setTimeout to ensure element mounting
Complex state management for tour progression
Handling various tour interaction scenarios (skip, complete, navigate)
Styling tour with design system tokens

key_achievements: Created custom styling matching design system

recommendations: Add unit tests for tour interaction scenarios
Consider making tour steps more configurable
Implement analytics tracking for tour engagement
